meanings.definition: A type of Italian vegetable soup.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a bowl of minestrones for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served delicious minestrones every Friday.
meanings.sent3: The minestrones were so tasty that they disappeared in minutes.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like a pot of simmering minestrones.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the minestrones filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.

meanings.sent1: We ordered two minestrones for the party.
meanings.sent2: The minestrones were a hit at the potluck dinner.
meanings.sent3: The minestrones lined up on the buffet table, ready to be devoured.
meanings.sent4: The crowd cheered as the minestrones were served, signaling the start of the feast.
meanings.sent5: The colorful minestrones added a vibrant touch to the meal.
